name: Boy in Ikea
description:
A short game about a young boy who got lost in Ikea.

Help Bubble find his mom in the huge Ikea labyrinth and help him face puzzles and hot lava.

The game is played from the perspective of the child (don't mind weird dialogue, it's childs talk!

A game designed for Unity engine classes in collaboration with my friend Natalia Pietkiewicz - you can help her in her rehabilitation under this link: https://www.siepomaga.pl/natalia-pietkiewicz
